content: Evening of Friday 29, is the begginning of the Jewish Holy day of Shavuos. Shavuos is 49 days after Pesach. To celebrate the giving of the Torah to Israel at Mt. Sinai. Good Shabbos D.J.
reply: Evening of Friday 29, is the begginning of the Jewish Holy day of Shavuos. Shavuos is 49 days after Pesach. To celebrate the giving of the Torah to Israel at Mt. Sinai. Good Shabbos D.J.

content: Shavuos is a holy day celebrated by the Jewish people, It is a religous holiday for the Jews, there are also Jews in the military or there were when i was on active duty. D.J.

content: quote: Originally posted by LegionSon: I keep forgetting to say Good Shabbos to you too Donnie. - Let us break bread together - - LegionSon - Thank You. Thank you again and sounds like a good idiea D.J.
